annotations.text:
Goal: Log into and interact with the host at 10.0.7.138.
Tool: The "ssh" command included with OpenSSH
Subtool: "logout" command
Result: successResult

Goal: End Asciinema recording
Tool: The "EOF" character is sent to "exit" of the shell recording session (by pressing control+D on the user's keyboard).
Result: successResult

Goal: Enter demo@10.0.7.138's password
Tool: Interactive password prompt from earlier "ssh" command
Secrets: passwordPrompt
Result: successResult

Goal: Install Asciinema package system-wide on 10.0.7.138.
Tool: The "sudo" command is used to elevate the "demo" account to administrative privileges.
Subtool: The Debian "apt" package manager is used to "install" the "asciinema" package.
Result: successResult

Goal: Log out of the SSH shell session.
Tool: The "EOF" character is sent to "logout" of the shell session (by pressing control+D on the user's keyboard).
Result: successResult
